text: Elizabeth "Beth" Howland (May 28, 1941 - December 31, 2015) was an American actress. She worked on stage, movies and television. She was best known for playing Vera Gorman in the sitcom Alice. Howland died of lung cancer on December 31, 2015 in Santa Monica, California, at the age of 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Beth Howland profile Category:1941 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Boston
title: Beth Howland
